name: Mr. Definitely Human
description:
OBS: Activate human walk by pressing Z

In a post-I-Robot-like world, where humans have thrown out and banned AI-robots out of fear for their superiority, we wake up in a junkyard as Mr. Definitely Human, a tossed and scrapped AI-bot who survived the extinction event. Your quest is to try and blend into society or sneak around it, in order to retrieve gear and parts to upgrade your human aspects in an attempt to fully blend in with society. 🤖
